name: Gaiasandbox
tagline: Gaia Sandbox, 3D visualisation software for Gaia and astronomy outreach
body:
### Welcome to the Gaia Sandbox GitHub page!
The Gaia Sandbox is a 3D visualisation software written in Java and OpenGL for Gaia and astronomy outreach. It is developed in the Gaia group of [Astronomisches Rechen-Institut](http://www.ari.uni-heidelberg.de) (ZAH, Universit√§t Heidelberg).

Please, visit our official page at <http://www.zah.uni-heidelberg.de/gaia/outreach/gaiasandbox/>

### Authors and Contributors
* **Author** - Toni Sagrista (@langurmonkey)
* **Contributors** - Apl. Prof. Dr. Stefan Jordan
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
